WorkItem.Description: When I want to publish a chinese story by posting a chinese website url. i got the content characters changed to be irrecognizable. After I changed HttpForm.cs line 269 to using (var sr = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream(), Encoding.Default)) problem is resolved. The key point is Encoding.Default. Please add it to latest code.
WorkItem.Summary: Can not display Chinese characters when get a source from some chinese website
